title: Russia Never Stopped Meddling
description:
A brand new report released Monday by the Senate is shedding new light on Russia's interference in the 2016 election. David Meyers speaks with Bloomberg's Ben Brody on how Russia's plot to divide Americans and help then-candidate Donald Trump was bigger than anyone thought.
FOLLOW UP
 Ben's latest report: Russia’s Bid to Help Trump Revealed as Much Wider Than Once Known
You can follow Ben at: @BenBrodyDC
---
 TicToc is a daily news podcast hosted by David Meyers (@davidfmeyers), produced at Bloomberg Worldwide HQ in New York City. You can follow up with us and watch our reporting @tictoc. If you like it, be sure to rate us on iTunes, and tell your friends
